head.title: Residential Sales From Around the Region

hedline.hl1: Residential Sales From Around the Region

4-family brick; primary duplex: 2 bedrooms, 11/2 baths; simplexes: 1 bedroom, 1 bath; 16-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $1,200; listed at $1.145 million. Brokers: Gwendolyn Fairly-Smith; Brooklyn Properties of 7th Ave.

$800,000 24 Winston Drive Number of bedrooms: 4 Number of full bathrooms: 2 Number of half bathrooms: 1 Weeks on market: 3 months 34-year-old ranch; entry hall, family room, fireplace, office, master bedroom with full bath, pool, deck, 2-car garage, 0.9-acre lot; taxes $13,143; listed at $885,000.
